kindred.model

Class Unit

  • Object
    • kindred.model.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends Object
    Defines a Unit that a User can command, as well as its Attributes.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Attribute attribute
      Attributes defining Unit's performance.
      private String name
      Name for the Unit's type.
      private int team
      Identifier number for the Unit's team.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Unit(String name, Attribute attribute, int team)
      Constructs a Unit.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAgi()
      Returns the Unit's attribute that represents its agility value.
      int getAtk()
      Returns the Unit's attribute that represents its attack power.
      int getCurrentHp()
      Returns this Unit's attribute that represents its current hit points.
      int getDef()
      Returns the Unit's attribute that represents its defense value.
      int getMove()
      Returns the Unit's attribute that represents its movement per turn.
      String getName()
      Returns this name given to the Unit's type.
      int getRange()
      Returns the Unit's attribute that represents it maximum range of attack.
      int getTeam()
      Returns a number that identifies which player the Unit belongs to.
      int getTotalHp()
      Returns this Unit's attribute that represents its total hit points.
      void loseHp(int damage)
      Reduces this Unit's current hit points according to the specified amount of damage.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private final String name
        Name for the Unit's type. There is no distinction in name for Units of the same type.

      • attribute

        private final Attribute attribute
        Attributes defining Unit's performance.

      • team

        private final int team
        Identifier number for the Unit's team. Shows which player controls the Unit.

        Constructs a Unit.
        Parameters:
        name - the Unit's name
        attribute - the Unit's attributes
        team - number identifying which Player the Unit belongs to
